vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to rinse, cleanse away by rinsing, cast out, purge, wash, washing
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) to rinse
1a2) to cleanse (by washing) (fig.)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 沖洗, 沖洗乾淨, 洗滌
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) 沖洗
1a2) 洗淨 (比喻用法) (賽4:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 冲洗, 冲洗干净, 洗涤
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) 冲洗
1a2) 洗净 (比喻用法) (赛4:3)
